content: some people asked me to make a pattern for my the witcher 3 amigurumi i posted on instagram and reddit so here it is for geralt and ciri it s not perfect and some parts like the hair will require a bit of improvising so it s helpful if you have some basic crocheting knowledge already if there is anything you don t understand send me a dm and i will try my best to help you may not sell this pattern or the finished dolls
